title: 183: The only supplements you need
description: If you believe the advertising and the hype, supplements can make or break your muscle growth. The truth is, your money and energy is better spent perfecting your workouts rather than counting on supplements that at best provide a slight edge and at worse can actually be harmful. There are some supplements worth taking, though, and in this episode, Sal, Adam & Justin reveal what supplements to take and when. Please subscribe, rate and review this show! Learn more about Mind Pump at www.mindpumpradio.com
